WorkItem.Description:
In an application following the methods described in the "Multiple Windows, Multiple Threads" section of msdn (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms741870.aspx), the AutoCompleteBox will throw an exception when it is being loaded.  It appears that it's trying to access the Application's "Windows" property.  The dispatcher for the AutoCompleteBox is not necessarily the same as the Application's dispatcher, which is required to access the Windows property, so it crashes.
Â 
at System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess()
   at System.Windows.Application.get_Windows()
   at System.Windows.Controls.PopupHelper.Arrange() in C:\dd\WPF_1\src\wpf\src\ControlsPack\WPFToolkit\Input\AutoCompleteBox\System\Windows\Controls\PopupHelper.cs:line 283
   at System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ArrangeOverride(Size finalSize) in C:\dd\WPF_1\src\wpf\src\ControlsPack\WPFToolkit\Input\AutoCompleteBox\System\Windows\Controls\AutoCompleteBox.cs:line 1385
WorkItem.Summary: AutoCompleteBox throws exception in Multiple UI Thread application
